description: Numbers n such that the sum of the digits of Fibonacci(n) in base 12 is n.
links: David Terr, On the Sums of Digits of Fibonacci Numbers, Fibonacci Quarterly 34, Aug. 1996, pp. 349-355.
maple: filter:= proc(n) convert(convert(combinat:-fibonacci(n),base,12),`+`)=n end proc:select(filter, [$1..3000]); # _Robert Israel_, Aug 03 2015
author: _Sven Simon_
